__project_comment__: project name. if credential paths not provided, the project name can be used to locate username/password in parameter store
__version_comment__: version number, which is used along with project name to distinguish different deployments
description: this is a deployment for test project v1.0
__credential_comment__: optional. paths of username/password in parameter store
__files_comment__: this filed contains information for sql script files which need to be deployed in the target database. also the order tells the sequence the files need to be executed
